payload.title: Welcome To LiteBlog
payload.description: What is LiteBlog you may ask. Well that's a ridiculous question because its quite obvious, Lite-B-l-o-g! Incase you're still lost, LiteBlog is a blogging system created by Mr Hodge. It's written in PHP using the VenomFramework. That's what it is in a nutshell, now let's get to specifics.
payload.content:
Welcome To LiteBlog v1.0

What is LiteBlog you may ask. Well that's a ridiculous question because its quite obvious, LiteBlog! Incase you're still lost, LiteBlog is a blogging system created by Mr Hodge. It's written in PHP using the VenomFramework. That's what it is in a nutshell, now let's get to specifics.

Features of LiteBlog:

  • Lightweight™.
  • Running on VenomFramework, an open source PHP framework. 
  • Elegant code.
  • Very easy to use.
  • Templating system, which means you can design the front end in any way that you like!
  • Comment system. Comments are stored within your database, no need to worry about a third party comment system.
  • User permissions and member system.
  • CKEditor, mmmm, tasty.
  • Advanced searching system.
  • API, which can be used to display posts on other websites and applications.
  • Many more that are too numerous to mention.

author.bio: The outcome isn't the beauty, the beauty is where it all began.
